name: 4x4 Russian SUVs Off-Road
description:
Welcome to the world of off-road SUVs and Russian!
A realistic physical behavior of an SUV while driving on a different road, whether boulders, mud puddles, prolonged climbs or deep fords, all this will make you believe that you are driving a real Russian SUV. And realistic 3D graphics and large open maps chase last doubts. Get behind the wheel of the legendary Russian SUV, find all sorts of interesting places, each of which may have its own history. Working to improve their machines and buy new cars. Feel all the charm of driving an SUV - climb the highest mountain, drive along the narrow rickety bridge, overcome ford finally get stuck in a narrow place, so that you can not get out! Here it is a real off-road driving!
We hope that the Russian SUV will be your favorite car of all!
Go ahead, conquer the world!
